newsitem.title: USA: Ga. House names Healthdyne panel members.
newsitem.headline: Ga. House names Healthdyne panel members.

text.p: The Georgia House on Thursday named three of its members to a House-Senate panel that will reexamine a measure to help Healthdyne Technologies Inc fight off a hostile takeover by Invacare Corp.
The measure, attached to a routine House bill in the Senate last week, would require publicly traded companies based in Georgia to stagger the election of directors.

Named to the six-member conference committee was Judiciary Committee Chairman Jim Martin, an Atlanta Democrat who proposed the underlying legislation, known a House Bill 294, which simply called for routine modifications to the state business code.
